cards.title: Celestial Aura
cards.body: Whenever {Starlight} would deal damage to a hero target next to a constellation, instead that target regains that much HP.
powers: {Starlight} deals 1 target 1 radiant damage. Draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: She's not an angel.{BR}I checked for wings.

cards.title: Event Horizon
body: Destroy any number of constellation cards.
For each card destroyed this way, destroy 1 ongoing or environment card.
cards.flavorText: Want to see what a{BR}thermonuclear warhead looks like{BR}after it's been through a black hole?
cards.flavorReference: Starlight To Baron Blade, Andromeda Tales #8

cards.title: Exodus
body: Draw a card, or search your trash and deck for a constellation card, put it into play, then shuffle your deck.
You may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Dr. Andromeda McLear.{BR}Astrophysicist, astronomer,{BR}stargazer. We've been watching her for{BR}a long time.

cards.title: Golden Astrolabe
powers: {Starlight} deals herself 2 energy damage. One hero character next to a constellation may use a power now.

flavorQuotes.text: It doesn't tell [b]us[/b] when{BR}the stars will align. It tells the stars.

cards.title: Nightlore Armor
cards.body: Whenever damage would be dealt to another hero target, you may destroy a constellation card in play to prevent that damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You're the first human agent{BR}of the Nightlore Council: surveyors{BR}and guardians of the stars.

cards.title: Nova Shield
cards.body: Whenever a constellation enters play next to a target, {Starlight} deals that target 1 energy damage and regains 1 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: And all I have are bullets...

cards.title: Pillars of Creation
cards.body: At the start of your play phase, put a constellation card from your hand or trash into play.

flavorQuotes.text: Warp tech doesn't{BR}create stars. It connects{BR}them.

cards.title: Redshift
body: Draw a card.
2 players may play 1 card.

flavorQuotes.text: Something is burning{BR}out the stars, one by one.
And you want to go looking{BR}for it?

cards.title: Retreat into the Nebula
body: Reduce damage dealt to {Starlight} by 2.
At the start of your turn, destroy a constellation card or destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: From her sanctuary in the{BR}Great Rift, Starlight sent an urgent{BR}beacon: “Unknown psionic entities have{BR}infiltrated the Council.”

cards.title: Stellar Wind
body: {Starlight} may deal 2 cold damage to each target next to a constellation.
Draw 2 cards.

flavorQuotes.text: I've been down this road, but{BR}I don't remember it being so well-lit.

cards.title: Warp Halo
cards.body: If a hero target next to a constellation would deal damage to a non-hero target next to a constellation, increase that damage by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: You're not where you{BR}think you are, Voss.

cards.title: Wish
cards.body: 1 player may look at the top 5 cards of their deck, put 1 of them into play, then put the rest on the bottom of their deck in any order.

flavorQuotes.text: A shooting star! Our{BR}luck's burning bright.

promoCards.title: Starlight
powers: {Starlight} deals each hero target 1 energy damage. Search your deck for up to 2 constellation cards and play them. Shuffle your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may put an ongoing card from their trash into their hand.
One player may use a power now.
Look at the top card of a deck, and replace it or discard it.

openingLines.default: This sector is under Nightlore protection.
openingLines.MenagerieCharacter: That mercenary has his own crimes to answer for. But let's start with yours.

promoCards.title: Starlight
setup: At the start of the game, put the character cards for the Starlight of Terra, Asheron, and Cryos-4 into play, active side up.
Shuffle the hero deck and draw 4 cards.
gameplay: If you have no hero character targets in play, flip this card.
When your cards refer to “Starlight”, choose 1 of your active Starlights.
When a copy of “Retreat into the Nebula” enters play, put it next to 1 of your active Starlights. Only that Starlight is affected by it.
If Starlight of Terra has a Constellation next to her at the start of your turn, each Starlight regains 1 HP.
If Starlight of Asheron has a Constellation next to her and deals damage to a non-hero target, increase that damage by 1.
Whenever a constellation enters play next to Starlight of Cryos-4, draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card now.
One play may use a power now.
The next time a hero target deals damage, choose the type of that damage.

openingLines.default: To survey the darkness and guard the light; this we pledge!
openingLines.MenagerieCharacter: By the order of the Nightlore Council, you are under arrest! ...Was that right?

promoCards.title: Starlight
powers: Discard a card. Search your deck and trash for {PillarsOfCreation}. Play it. Shuffle your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.
One hero may use a power now.
Destroy any number of hero ongoing cards. Then destroy 1 ongoing card.

openingLines.default: Just look right here, if you please.
openingLines.MenagerieCharacter: The truth of your crimes is out there, Menagerie. Don't make this harder than it needs to be.
